content: chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st *fpdc half_double_crochet repeat from * 12x fpdc join with a slip_stitch in half_double_crochet rounds 3-5 repeat round 2 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *fpsc single_crochet repeat from * 12x fpsc join with a slip_stitch round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 *slip_stitch in next st chain 1 repeat from * 26x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off fingers round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the right corner of the granny chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet double_crochet in corner of granny work 12 double_crochet evenly across palm join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 26 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 24x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off thumb round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the thumb hole chain 3 counts as double_crochet work 13 double_crochet evenly around join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 14 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st decrease single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet decrease single_crochet in each of next 5 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 12 row 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 10x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends
